pages.title: That's So Metal
pages.text: I warned you about the manual labour, right? Well here it comes. Stick some of those $(item)Ironberries$() in the $(item)Crushing Tub$() and get to $(thing)jumping$(). As hardy as they are, these berries readily squish into $(item)Juice$(). Then, transfer the $(item)Juice$() to a $(item)Drying Basin$() to produce $(item)Tiny Piles of Iron Dust$(). Smelt these in a furnace, then combine and voila, $(item)Iron Ingot$().
